alert.note: Alert for Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:43PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Walker and eastern Winston Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 343 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Addison to Poplar Springs. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Arley, Double Springs, Addison, Nauvoo, Curry, Camp McDowell, Nesmith, Ashbank, Poplar Springs, Falls City, Smith Lake, Helicon, Inmanfield, Sardis, Corinth Rec Area, Houston, Mill Branch, Clear Creek and Winston County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
